headline.print_headline: Disqualified OC Marathon Winner Denies Cheating
headline.main: Disqualified OC Marathon Winner Denies Cheating

docs.snippet: The disqualified winner of the Orange County Marathon says he still thinks he's a champion and denies he cheated....
docs.lead_paragraph: The disqualified winner of the Orange County Marathon says he still thinks he's a champion and denies he cheated.

headline.print_headline: Texans Take DE Clowney With First Pick in NFL Draft
headline.main: Texans Take DE Clowney With First Pick in NFL Draft

docs.snippet: The Houston Texans beefed up their defensive line by taking extraordinary pass rusher Jadeveon Clowney from the University of South Carolina with the first pick of the 2014 National Football League Draft on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Houston Texans beefed up their defensive line by taking extraordinary pass rusher Jadeveon Clowney from the University of South Carolina with the first pick of the 2014 National Football League Draft on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Court Issues Temporary Stay Over Voter Citizenship
headline.main: Court Issues Temporary Stay Over Voter Citizenship

docs.snippet: Kansas and Arizona residents can continue to register to vote for now using a federal form without having to provide proof of citizenship, a federal appeals court ruled Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kansas and Arizona residents can continue to register to vote for now using a federal form without having to provide proof of citizenship, a federal appeals court ruled Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Man in the Kitchen Is Hungry for Love
headline.seo: ‘Chef,’ a Culinary Comedy by Jon Favreau
headline.main: Man in the Kitchen Is Hungry for Love

docs.snippet: In “Chef,” the director and writer Jon Favreau plays a high-end Los Angeles chef whose rise to gastronomic stardom is abruptly ended by a restaurant critic....
docs.abstract: Stephen Holden reviews film Chef, written, directed by and starring Jon Favreau.
docs.lead_paragraph: In “Chef,” the director and writer Jon Favreau plays a high-end Los Angeles chef whose rise to gastronomic stardom is abruptly ended by a restaurant critic.

headline.main: The Real Story About the Wrong Photos in #BringBackOurGirls

docs.snippet: A photographer is aghast at how her photographs taken in Guinea-Bissau were used – without permission – to represent girls kidnapped in Nigeria....
docs.lead_paragraph: A photographer is aghast at how her photographs taken in Guinea-Bissau were used – without permission – to represent girls kidnapped in Nigeria.

headline.print_headline: Omnicom, Publicis Call Off Proposed $35 Billion Merger
headline.main: Omnicom, Publicis Call Off Proposed $35 Billion Merger

docs.snippet: The proposed $35 billion (20.65 billion pounds) merger between U.S.-based Omnicom Group Inc and French rival Publicis Groupe SA has been called off as the challenges in forming the world's largest advertising agency proved too immense for the part...
docs.lead_paragraph: The proposed $35 billion (20.65 billion pounds) merger between U.S.-based Omnicom Group Inc and French rival Publicis Groupe SA has been called off as the challenges in forming the world's largest advertising agency proved too immense for the partners.

headline.print_headline: UK Employers Increasingly Struggle to Fill Vacancies-Survey
headline.main: UK Employers Increasingly Struggle to Fill Vacancies-Survey

docs.snippet: British employers are offering higher pay as the pool of good job candidates dries up at its fastest rate in nearly a decade, according to a survey which may worry the Bank of England....
docs.lead_paragraph: British employers are offering higher pay as the pool of good job candidates dries up at its fastest rate in nearly a decade, according to a survey which may worry the Bank of England.

headline.print_headline: AP Sources: NY Mayor to Name Fire Department Boss
headline.main: AP Sources: NY Mayor to Name Fire Department Boss

docs.snippet: A retired fire officer who helped rebuild the city's fire department after the Sept. 11 terrorist attacks will be named the its new commissioner, according to two officials briefed on Mayor Bill de Blasio's decision....
docs.lead_paragraph: A retired fire officer who helped rebuild the city's fire department after the Sept. 11 terrorist attacks will be named the its new commissioner, according to two officials briefed on Mayor Bill de Blasio's decision.

headline.print_headline: Britain Set for Stronger Growth Than Previously Expected-NIESR
headline.main: Britain Set for Stronger Growth Than Previously Expected-NIESR

docs.snippet: Britain's economy will grow faster than previously expected this year and should exceed its January 2008 peak size in the next few months, a leading economic research body said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's economy will grow faster than previously expected this year and should exceed its January 2008 peak size in the next few months, a leading economic research body said on Friday.

headline.sub: As Mothers weep, Nigeria's president pledges to free kidnapped girls
headline.main: As Mothers weep, Nigeria's president pledges to free kidnapped girls

docs.snippet: Nigerian President Goodluck Jonathan promised to find more than 200 schoolgirls abducted by Islamist rebels, as mothers come together demanding a speedy intervention. Jillian Kitchener reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nigerian President Goodluck Jonathan promised to find more than 200 schoolgirls abducted by Islamist rebels, as mothers come together demanding a speedy intervention. Jillian Kitchener reports.
